title: What is delaying the clearing for the remaining section of I 140 that would connect to 74-76?  If that section of the road were completed there would be less traffic on the existing road.  There are 3 bridges that dump traffic onto the current section. Completion of 140 would alleviate a lot of that traffic where there are bottlenecks both morning and evening and when the bridge is up.
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=20609
